mapper.insert: INSERT INTO animal (anino, uid, aname, age, gender, weight, genop, vac, intro, anipic, adopt, adopt_pos, animal_date) VALUES (#{anino}, #{uid}, #{aname}, #{age}, #{gender}, #{weight}, #{genop}, #{vac}, #{intro}, #{anipic}, #{adopt}, #{adopt_pos}, NOW())
mapper.select: SELECT anino, aname, age, gender, weight, genop, vac, intro, anipic, adopt, cnt, adopt_pos, animal_date FROM animal ORDER BY animal_date desc LIMIT #{offset}, #{size};
SELECT anino, aname, age, gender, weight, genop, vac, intro, anipic, adopt, cnt, adopt_pos, animal_date FROM animal WHERE adopt_pos = 'Y' ORDER BY rand() LIMIT 4
SELECT COUNT(eduno) FROM education WHERE uid = #{uid} AND score >= 60 AND eduop LIKE CONCAT('%', #{anino}, '%')
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM adopt WHERE DATE_FORMAT(sub_date, '%y%m%d') = DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%y%m%d')
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO adopt (uid, anino, apno, sub_cont, sub_state, sub_date, subpic) VALUES (#{uid}, #{anino}, #{apno}, #{sub_cont}, DEFAULT, now(), #{subpic})
